actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 102 of title 28, United States Code, to establish an additional Federal judicial district in the State of Michigan.
short_title: Michigan District Court Organization Act of 1980

summary.text: Michigan District Court Organization Act of 1980 - Establishes three judicial districts in Michigan: (1) the Eastern District; (2) the Western District; and (3) a new Northern District consisting of the Southern, Northern, and Eastern Divisions.

titles.title: Michigan District Court Organization Act of 1980
A bill to amend section 102 of title 28, United States Code, to establish an additional Federal judicial district in the State of Michigan.
